body.name: Unicorn Sit and Spin Toy, Birthday Gift for Girls Age 1 2 3 4 Years Old, Toddler Toys, with LED and Music, 360° Spin
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 21 hrs 33 mins
features: 🦄 Unicorn Theme Design - Spark your toddler's imagination with our whimsical Unicorn sit and spin toy. The toddler spinning round and round, giggling silly with music and lights. Its captivating unicorn design will transport them to a magical world of fun and adventure. Perfect for toddler girls and boys aged 1-3 years old.

🎵 Music and LED Light - Enhance your little one sensory development with our Unicorn sit and spin toy's three different music. Each music is carefully selected to engage toddlers and encourage imaginative play. Additionally, the toy features two colors flashing, adding a visual element of delight and amusement.

🌈 3 Modes-The toddler can choose the mode they like, the first mode, no lights and music, the second mode only lights (if you like quiet), the third mode, lights and music (soft flashing lights, cheerful music),on-off control, even toddler can adjust it by themselves. Suitable for toddler ages 1 2 3 4 years old. Need 3*AA batteries (not included)

❤ Safe and Sturdy - Our Unicorn sit and spin toy is designed to withstand the energetic play of toddlers. With a maximum weight capacity of 55 LB (25 kg), perfect toy for toddles age 1-3, 2-4 years old. Unique flying saucer shape, can easily attract your kids attention. This toy can help toddlers develop their balance, coordination and motor skills

🎁 Perfect Gift for Toddlers - Whether play indoors or in the backyard with friends, our Unicorn sit and spin toy is the perfect addition to any toddler's toy collection, enabling your child to enjoy endless whimsical adventures anywhere their imagination takes them. Perfect birthday and Christmas gift for toddler girls and boys over 1 year old

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sit and spin is the COOLEST. It is a UNICORN sit and spin!!
reviews.reviewText: As a kid I always wanted a Sit and Spin, but my parents could never afford one. SO when my granddaughter put this on her Christmas list - we bought it for her. BUT this sit and spin is so much more amazing than the ones when I was growing up!! This sit and spin is the COOLEST. It is a UNICORN sit and spin and it has lights and music!! My granddaughter had the biggest smile on her face, not only when she opened it on Christmas day, but while she was spinning circles on it. She can control how fast she wants to spin, which helps with hand and muscle strength. Since she is the one in control she can go slow and enjoy the lights or she can spin like a tornado with the music pumping – it's all up to her! What girl doesn't like unicorns and the unicorn design is ADORABLE. The bright colors and sparkly details make it extra special. The quality was top-notch and I am pretty sure this will last her for several years. Our granddaughter was extremely pleased and we highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 2 year old Granddaughter. She only took a few minutes to figure out how to spin. Easy to put together and very cute. Brings back memories of the old ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Children will always love this ! Works great, no issues at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: A Christmas gift for our 2 year-old granddaughter. It took a few minutes to figure it out, but she did. She loves this toy. I think the music is a bit too loud, but that’s because I’m an old fuddy duddy. It can be turned off.
